opinion.posture: The defendant's motion for bail pending appeal is denied, since a motion for bail pending appeal is pending in Superior Court. This case is remanded to Superior Court for the purpose of the aforesaid bail hearing.
opinion.attorneys:
Julius C. Michaelson, Attorney General, Judith RomneyWegner, Special Asst. Attorney General, for plaintiff.
William T. Murphy, for defendant.Page 938
